website_summaries.verdict: LG's Google Nexus 4 is a powerful unlocked smartphone with a beautiful, minimalist design, fast performance, and the latest version of Android.
pros: Fast HSPA+ 42 data speeds on T-Mobile
Improved localized search results with Google Now
cons: Slow HSPA+ 21 data speeds on AT&T

customer_reviews.title: It now contains my entire life!
customer_reviews.text: This phone, together with the endless apps available, has become my life organizer and information holder. Schedule, ideas, plans, recipes, photos, health, interests, hobbies, studies... I can go on and on. Do yourself a favor, look up the best or most useful apps for Nexus 4 on the internet and download the ones that suit you. Another tip: Take advantage of the folder option - group similar apps together (photography, navigation, files, communication, social networking, hobbies, health...) for a well-organized phone that works for you and makes your life so much more organized. Very soon you will be wondering how people without this phone manage anything!
customer_reviews.author: Estee

customer_reviews.title: European version - although does come with un-official UK plug
customer_reviews.text: This device is the European version as such has no UK plug supplied in the official box. A UK USB plug was supplied within the Amazon packaging which is good however it was a Samsung branded once whilst this phone is from LG. This shouldn't matter but isn't what I expected. Unfortunately my device was faulty and an area of the screen did not work correctly so it has now been sent back. I expect this to be just unfortunate rather than anything to do with the supplier and Amazon have taken it back without any issue. From using other Nexus 4s I can say it is a great device but I was unlucky with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone. Used it for years
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Used it for years. Gave it to my Dad. He's getting on great with it. Sure, it's a Google flagship product. They really try to do their best by them. Probably get slower as the years grow on it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mara

customer_reviews.title: Google Nexus 4
customer_reviews.text: Never regret so far. Having AnTuTu benchmark of 17143 there aren't any slowdown or interface freezing. Battery life is enough for 1-2 days assuming continuous WiFi usage. Furthermore, Bingsale® TPU Skin Case Google Nexus 4 seems the best case: it's slim enough and instead of mumbi PREMIUM Leather Flip Case Google Nexus 4 protects it but not trying to increase its natural beauty :)
customer_reviews.author: Vitaly Lunyov

customer_reviews.title: good phone, exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: there is so many online reviews that I do not feel I can contribute anything new here. Good phone if you dislike bloatware and useless "skins" companies like Sony/HTC/Samsung/... enforce on you with their customizations of Android.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device, met all my expectations. I've been using it for about a month and a half, and it is very fast and responsive. It never crashed and I'd never had any error message, or applications that sudenly close, unlike some friend's phones (Samsung Galaxy S4). I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smartphone
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Great interphase, lightweight and with the latest android version. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for the latest in technology and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: scravero

customer_reviews.title: Screen shattered...
customer_reviews.text: brought it for a friend and within a week she dropped it from a low height and the screen shattered. Searching on the internet it seems others have had similar problems with the screen easily shattering when compared to other makes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone has a good screen for playing games and using apps. It has a good, clear camera and the phone arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Quelch

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone, but a serious premium to buy in the UK versus US
customer_reviews.text: Generally the phone is excellent. No complaints. Formerly I had a HTC Desire and a Samsung SIII [both stolen, not blaming Amazon here :)]. I would have expected this phone to cost about 10-20% more in the U.K., not 50+%!! Regarding delivery, it was on-time and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Fast Phone but minor defects
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone I've seen in terms of speed, everything is fab except 2 things: 1. No FM radio 2. Headphone pops out from jack (maybe just in my case) Apart from that, best phone performance against price
customer_reviews.author: Yongjun Ren

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the Nexus 4 - nice feel, quick responses and user friendly navigation. One tiny crib = unable to delete"Upload" folders from the Gallery App. Mary Eliz
customer_reviews.author: Maryeliz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. I think is best price/quality smartphone ever made. Did a lot of comparison with other phones of my friends, was faster and better. Bought for it the official bumper, cause I never had a phone with so much glass :D
customer_reviews.author: Dan Palarie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and fast, all I need
customer_reviews.text: It is a super phone. I've had it for one month now and am fully satisfied with it. It can do everything I need (and more), and it does so quickly and without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ulriksen

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This phone has all the features of other android phones for cheaper. It also appears to be more durable than others.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget.
customer_reviews.text: The best smartphone considering price/technical parameters ratio. Just compare prices on smartphones which have 4-core processor plus 2 Gb RAM.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeniy Kravchenko

customer_reviews.title: Precise and punctual
customer_reviews.text: The object is in excellent condition and it is an beautiful smartphone I like all of it I recommend this product to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Federico Bergamo

customer_reviews.title: Phone speaker was broken
customer_reviews.text: Generally, the phone is OK and worth the price. However, the phone speaker was not working it had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Grodzki

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the money very satisfied with my purchase.Arrived quickly and without any problems, should last for some time
customer_reviews.author: Abramo

customer_reviews.title: Great phone..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money when compared with the latest smartphones. Being a Google phone it gets all the latest android updates and enhancements before any of the others. Quick processor means you're not waiting around. Best phone I've had for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It is even better than I expected. The Nexus 4 is fast, reliable and one can find a lot of useful apps for free. The price is certainly competitive. I can only recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Dappiaggi

customer_reviews.title: So fast.
customer_reviews.text: Veri fast phone. Screen is better than I phone 5, camera bit worster than I phone. Easy to use, everything is smooth. Can say that best price and quality value phone in market.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Sirel

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Nel mezzo del cammin di nostra vita mi ritrovai per una selva oscura ché la diritta via era smarrita. Ahi quanto a dir qual era è cosa dura esta selva selvaggia e aspra e forte che nel pensier rinova la paura!
customer_reviews.author: Francesco Ganozzi

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, quality phone.
customer_reviews.text: I think this phone is wonderful, I would recommend it to anyone. I am very pleased with how easy it is to use and nicely tactile. Some phones 'feel' awkward just to hold, this one feels quality made and is nice. I have had no teething problems with it, it was easy to set up and get running. Quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Godber7

customer_reviews.title: More with less
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Smartphone. One of the only phones with 2GB of RAM. it is fast to run applications. it has a good screen. camera of the mean value. there is no the option to expand the 8GB of internal memory. but the price is very competitive because it is a phone that can compete with the more famous samsung or apple.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Worst buy ever.
customer_reviews.text: Worst buy ever. After one week the phone fell 0.5 meter on a wodden floor and the screen broke. After that the phone did not work anymore. Searching the internet showed me that this is a very commen issue. Do not by this phone unless you also buy a large protective cover.
customer_reviews.author: Bent Kuhre

customer_reviews.title: Price / Quality THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome, smooth and fast, can handle every application you put into it without any problem, the only downside if exist is the charger....
customer_reviews.author: Tiago Domingues

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: An impressive phone and so much cheaper than an iphone. We have even bought a second one. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A J Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great smartphone
customer_reviews.text: It is a great smartphone and it is my first smartphone also. Though, I hated that it does not included a added qwerty as my other phones but I found the keybord very receptive. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: chepelink

customer_reviews.title: excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: excellent phone the best anywhere for the money does everything the 700 euro iPhone 5 and s3 do and some better any body who sees this phone and still thinks the galaxy s3 is worth 700 needs 2 be locked up for madness this is 50 euro more expensive then on Google play but since they will not sell it in Ireland 50 euro is still better then 400 on an s3
customer_reviews.author: thedon

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy LG offering
customer_reviews.text: I had my Nexus phone for ten months before it suffered a Sudden Descent Event (I dropped it). Only a few inches, no more than ten, and it had a protective buffer case. It shattered. Gorillaglass? More like sugarglass. Parts cost £99 to fix, almost £200 if you send it away. A whole new industry has arisen mending these phones, look online, and eBay is awash with smashed Nexus phones being sold for parts. Unlike its larger siblings who are made by Samsung and are more robust, the LG phone is fragile and explodes on the slightest impact. I'll not be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: RPG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Arrived a day early. Lightweight with a nice big screen. Should probably have gone for a 16gb but the 8gb is perfect for me so far with Google play. Would highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: nexus 4 is great
customer_reviews.text: Nexus 4 proved me that android is a very good os if you have the proper hardware. Everything works perfectly on nexus 4.
customer_reviews.author: jackofhearts

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For Money
customer_reviews.text: I had an Iphone 4 and wanted to upgrade but thought that the Iphone 5 price is outrageous. Well the Nexus 4 is amazing value. I was initially put off by the fact that it is made by LG, but needn't have worried because the build quality is superb. It is incredibly quick in operation too. Can't recommend it too highly. And i'm now a convert to the Android OS. Apple needs to watch out as they are being overtaken now in usability and price.
customer_reviews.author: Doozy

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone but don't buy it from these clowns
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing, but can be bought direct from Google for £239 and the 16GB version is £279. May be a wait for it but come on...
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: A truly amazing phone, iPhone has had it's day!
customer_reviews.text: After being an iPhone user from 4 to 4s I'd genuinely say this is an amazing phone. The hardware is great! Feels around the same weight as the iPhone 5 - if feels comfortable to use and feels song/sturdy. If like me your using iPhone and thinking of buying this instead I'd say go for it. Yes at first you'll find it word. But only because your so use iOS. Just look for the nexus videos on YouTube and you'll see. Oh nearly forgot' I wouldn't pay these prices. Even Carphone Warehouse is cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Brian Moran

customer_reviews.title: You Are Paying Too Much
customer_reviews.text: This device has an RRP of £239 from Google. So, if you don't mind waiting for them to get stock of this product, I would hold fire and buy through Google The phone, however, is the best you will find in this price range by far so the star rating is based on the price rather than the product
customer_reviews.author: TechtheWeek

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: I really love the nexus 4 it's a super phone! And it does everything a high end phone does and better! The stock android is fantastic and easy to use :) however this phone is fragile and a drop could break the glass on the front and back.
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: At least 6 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Superb phone and incredible value from the Google store. Great design, performance, screen and good battery life considering what it does. I can not rate this phone too highly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but get it on google play
customer_reviews.text: You can pick up this phone for £159 from play.google.com/devices so don't waste your money paying more when you can get it for less from the official place
customer_reviews.author: RaithSphere

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The reason the Nexus 4 is such an amazing phone is because it's so cheap, if you're going to pay £400+ for the N4 you're far better off buying a smartphone actually worth that much instead Go buy an S3 or wait for the S4 or the HTC M7
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joshua Brodie

customer_reviews.title: very overprice
customer_reviews.text: Google is selling this phone at 300 euros and you more than double. VERY VERY EXPENSIVE DEAL. It is a really nice phone - hardware and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Mihai

product_meta.description:
BRIGHTPOINT NEXUS 4 8GB IN

Returns accepted only if unopened and not damaged. Packaging is undamaged, if damaged this may be due to postal problems.
